message.body: I think we should watch her all night. Can we take turns? I will stay up for two more hours. Can you take over at 4?
I am with her. I can't talk. She gets upset when we argue
I'm not interested in arguing. I would like to talk with u about the schedule. But if u don't want to consult about it that is your choice.
Are u willing to consult about the schedule?
Forgot to mention that tomorrow Soraya ends school at 12:34. I'm going to make some calls in the morning and we go from there...
Romain Tomatoes Cucumber Carrots Eggs Avocado Croutons Cesar dressing Tossed To go --------- Also a drink Palagrino lemon Something to eat and drink for Soraya
AT&T suspended my telephone service. Could you look into it please?
Just power off your phone then back on
I did that already and it worked. Forgot to tell you. I am cramming pages...
